name: Zeratul
title: Dark Prelate
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Singularity Spike
abilities.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 228 damage after 1 second and Slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport to the target location. Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

heroics.name: Might Of The Nerazim
heroics.description: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage. Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% more damage.

heroics.name: Void Prison
heroics.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

original.name: Zeratul
original.title: Dark Prelate
original.description: The enigmatic dark templar Zeratul serves the xel'naga. While he expertly wields the power of the Void, it is his wisdom that earns him the respect of the Koprulu sector's leaders - despite his penchant for dramatic entrances.
original.shortDescription: A stealthed Assassin who can dart around his enemies.

baseHeroInfo.name: Zeratul
baseHeroInfo.title: Dark Prelate
baseHeroInfo.description: The enigmatic dark templar Zeratul serves the xel'naga. While he expertly wields the power of the Void, it is his wisdom that earns him the respect of the Koprulu sector's leaders - despite his penchant for dramatic entrances.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A stealthed Assassin who can dart around his enemies.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Permanent Cloak
trait.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or Channeling ends Stealth. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

abilities.name: Singularity Spike
abilities.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 228 damage after 1 second and Slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Teleport to the target location. Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

heroicAbilities.description: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage. Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% more damage.

heroicAbilities.name: Void Prison
heroicAbilities.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

otherAbilities.name: Shadow Assault
otherAbilities.description: Basic Attacks cause Zeratul to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.

skins.name: Dark Prelate
skins.description: The enigmatic dark templar Zeratul serves the xel'naga. While he expertly wields the power of the Void, it is his wisdom that earns him the respect of the Koprulu sector's leaders - despite his penchant for dramatic entrances.

skins.name: Dark Prelate Zeratul
skins.description: Upon selection, each Dark Prelate is presented with a unique armor reflecting their beliefs and personality. Zeratul rarely dons the Shadow's Embrace, as he prefers less formal attire.

skins.name: Executor Zeratul
skins.description: In his final moments, Zeratul made the ultimate sacrifice to defeat the Overmind and secure victory over the zerg. Inspired by his example, the Templar and Dark Templar are united once more.

skins.name: Zerg Hunter Zeratul
skins.description: The Zer'atai clan of Dark Templar are renowned hunters. For nearly a millennium, they have wandered across Shakuras, fashioning intricate armors from the bones of their prey.

skins.name: Ronin Zeratul
skins.description: After failing to protect his lord from the Lenassa clan, Zeratul severed his nerve cords and his connection to his home. Now he wanders, searching for a way to atone for his sins.

skins.name: High Templar Zeratul
skins.description: Despite Judicator Raszagal's warning that only heresy comes from contact with the Dark Ones, Praetor Zeratul believes that this "Tassadar" may be the key to Aiur's salvation.
